abilities.name: Poison Structure
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Sidney's Stadium is in play, you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Poisoned. This power can't be used if Cacturne is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Pin Missile
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
